title: Huge 2-Level, 4 Bedroom, 2 Bath Rental on Nottinghill Rd in Brighton
posting_body: This is a fantastic rental opportunity in a beautiful 2-Family House in Brighton close to Washington St and the Green-Line B Train.
This second floor apartment boasts 2 levels of living space!
On the main level is the spacious living room w/ open layout to Eat-In-Kitchen w/ small balcony..
there is also a full bathroom and 2 large bedrooms on this level.
On the second level there are 2 more bedrooms that are HUGE w/ another full bathroom in the hallway.
Plenty of closet space, hardwood floors on the main level and carpets on the second floor.
Upstairs bedrooms have been used for double occupancy in the past, they are very large.
This apartment is located right in-between Washington Street and Chiswick Road T Stop, right off the Sutherland
Nearby there are plenty of restaurants and shops as well as a Whole Foods market!
The apartment will be professionally cleaned and maintained prior to new tenants move-in date.
Heating is not included, it is a new gas furnace for heating efficiency.
Plenty of easy street parking in this neighborhood, permit required.
